prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that looks like a dragon with fierce blue scales and sharp fins.
Show me a powerful creature with a serpentine body and vibrant yellow and blue accents.
Generate an aquatic beast that has a long, flowing tail and a menacing expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines the majesty of a dragon with the ferocity of the sea.
Design a legendary water creature with a bold color scheme and intimidating presence.
Make a Pokemon that embodies strength and agility, featuring striking red and blue colors.
Give me a depiction of a massive sea creature that dominates its underwater habitat.
